channel.title: RSS Aggregator Feed
channel.description: An aggregated feed of Technology-related news

item.title: You'd be crazy to pass up this 5TB cloud storage deal - Internxt is offering a 90% discount on lifetime plans all with antivirus, encrypted VPN, and file-sharing included
item.description: This Internxt deal is as close as you'll get to free lifetime cloud storage.

item.title: Comment connecter ses manettes de Nintendo Switch 1 sur une Switch 2 ?
item.description: La Nintendo Switch 2 permet d'utiliser les manettes de la Nintendo Switch première du nom. Mais la procédure n'est pas toujours simple à comprendre.

item.title: 'It would be difficult to find a better speaker for under £50' — well, this Anker SoundCore 2 is now under £25
item.description: Anker's budget Bluetooth speaker crashes to a record-low price

item.title: Avec plus de 50 % de remise, cette énorme batterie externe 300W de 48 000 mAh avec écran numérique devient une vraie solution d’autonomie et d’économie
item.description: Ugreen propose une vaste gamme de solutions autour de l'autonomie, des chargeurs comme des batteries, telle cette power bank 300 W vendue 84,99 euros au lieu de 199,99 euros.

item.title: OpenAI reportedly finalizing $100B deal at more than $850B valuation
item.description: OpenAI is reportedly getting close to closing a $100 billion deal, with backers including Amazon, Nvidia, SoftBank, and Microsoft. The deal would value the ChatGPT-maker at $850 billion.

item.title: Xenoblade Chronicles X is $20 off in time for its Switch 2 upgrade
item.description: Nintendo just released a Switch 2 upgrade for Xenoblade Chronicles X: Definitive Edition. The upgrade is $4.99 for owners of the Switch game, or $64.99 if you buy the Switch 2 version. Don’t buy the Switch 2 version! Instead, score a deal on the digital Switch version that’s $39.99 (originally $59.99) at GameStop and Amazon. […]

item.title: Current is a new RSS reader that’s more like a river than an inbox
item.description: Current introduces a stress-free, totally reimagined RSS news reading app as a one-time paid download.

item.title: Nintendo announces surprise Switch 2 version of sci-fi RPG Xenoblade Chronicles X: Definitive Edition
item.description: Last year’s Xenoblade Chronicles X: Definitive Edition was significant for a few reasons. It was the final major first-party Switch game ahead of the Switch 2’s arrival in June, and the last doomed Wii U game to be granted a second life on Nintendo’s infinitely more successful console. Nearly a year on, a Switch 2 update for one of the most technically impressive games Nintendo has ever published has finally arrived. Somewhat hilariously titled Xenoblade Chronicles X: Definitive Edition - Nintendo Switch 2 Edition (you get the feeling Nintendo has started a naming convention it may come to reg...

item.title: Mauvaise nouvelle chez Free qui augmente le prix de son forfait Série Free
item.description: Free Mobile augmente le tarif mensuel de son forfait « Série Free », sans toucher au reste.

item.title: Fin de Windows 10 : voici comment installer Linux, choisir sa distribution, créer sa clé USB bootable et configurer son nouveau système
item.description: Windows 10 n'est plus disponible. Votre PC refuse Windows 11 ? Linux offre une seconde vie gratuite avec des versions qui ressemblent à Windows et ne demandent aucune compétence technique.

item.title: Renault et le géant chinois Geely dévoilent un moteur hybride à 3,3 L/100 km : pourquoi c’est une erreur
item.description: Horse, l'entité dédiée aux moteurs thermiques et hybrides de Renault, vient de présenter en partenariat avec Repsol un nouveau moteur hybride affichant une consommation de seulement 3,3 litres aux 100 km. Si la prouesse d'ingénierie est indéniable, cet investissement massif dans une motorisation thermique arrive au pire moment pour la transition vers la voiture électrique. Décryptage. ...

item.title: It’s Not Just Your Screens: Why So Many People Suddenly Need Glasses
item.description: A new study suggests that dim lighting may be the underlying reason behind the surge in nearsightedness.

item.title: Sex toys maker Tenga says hacker stole customer information
item.description: The Japanese sex toy maker said a hacker broke into an employee's inbox and stole customer names, email addresses, and correspondence, including order details and customer service inquiries.

item.title: Championing data leadership: how can data strategy shape AI success?
item.description: Unlock AI's true potential with data quality, integrity and governance.

item.title: Batten down the hatches - ransomware attacks are increasingly targeting firewalls, experts claim
item.description: Make sure to secure your firewalls - or face the risk of ransomware attack.

item.title: The new Philips Baristina coffee maker brews superb espresso, and surprised me with a very cool feature I've never seen before
item.description: If you're looking for an entry-level machine that takes the messier parts of brewing espresso out of your hands, this is the one for you.

item.title: Proton VPN two-year subscriptions are 70 percent off right now
item.description: Proton VPN is running a solid deal right now, dropping its two-year Proton VPN Plus plan to $2.99 per month. That works out to $72 billed upfront for the first 24 months, which represents a 70 percent discount compared to its regular pricing. We’ve rated Proton VPN highly thanks to its strong privacy credentials, transparent nonprofit backing and consistently fast performance. It’s one of the services we recommend in our guide to the best VPNs, and this deal also shows up alongside other standout offers in our ongoing roundup of the best VPN deals. It’s a good option if you’re looking to lock ...

item.title: AI governance under strain: what modern platforms mean for data privacy
item.description: AI risk emerges from live systems and processes, not abstract policies or model behavior.

item.title: Piratage DGFiP FICOBA : comment bloquer les prélèvements SEPA frauduleux après la fuite 1,2 million d’IBAN
item.description: Avec autant d'IBAN volés, ce n'est qu'une question de temps avant que quelqu'un constate un prélèvement qu'il ne reconnaît pas sur son compte en banque.

item.title: The speech police came for Colbert
item.description: Generally speaking, arcane and mostly unenforced FCC rules are not the province of late night talk shows. FCC Commissioner Brendan Carr seems intent on changing that, though; not long after causing a ruckus that briefly took Jimmy Kimmel off the air, his vague threats appear to have been enough to convince CBS to tell Stephen […]

item.title: Silent Hill: Townfall looks set to be a PS5 console exclusive — Xbox and Switch 2 are absent from official listings
item.description: Silent Hill: Townfall looks like it won't be coming to Xbox or Switch 2 — not at launch at the very least.

item.title: Bug in student admissions website exposed children’s personal information
item.description: Ravenna Hub, which lets parents apply and track the status of their kids' applications across thousands of schools, allowed any logged-in user to access the personally identifiable data associated with any other user, including their children.

item.title: Addiction, santé mentale : Instagram en procès, et ça pourrait faire mal à Meta
item.description: Le caractère addictif d'Instagram est sur le banc des accusés. Pendant un procès qui se tient actuellement à Los Angeles, les dirigeants de Meta, dont Mark Zuckerberg, défendent leur bout de gras en évoquant la liberté d'expression. Le patron de Meta a même tenté d'impliquer Apple.

item.title: The ‘Doctor Who’ TV Movie Is Getting the Remaster It Deserves
item.description: As Paul McGann's debut as the eighth Doctor turns 30 this year, the BBC is celebrating in style.

item.title: Money no longer matters to AI’s top talent
item.description: Today on Decoder we’re going to talk about the war for AI talent. Right now, the hottest job market on the planet is for AI researchers. The vast majority of these people are concentrated into a small number of hugely valuable, extremely fast-growing companies in the San Francisco Bay Area. Nowadays, such companies are paying […]

item.title: Reload wants to give your AI agents a shared memory
item.description: Reload announces a $2.275 million raise in a round led by Anthemis and the launch of its first AI employee, Epic.

item.title: Rivian owners will soon be able to access vehicle controls using their Apple Watch
item.description: Rivian is launching a companion app that pairs with Apple Watch in the coming week.

item.title: Apple's iPhone Air MagSafe battery pack is cheaper than ever
item.description:
We found the iPhone Air to have a pretty decent battery life for such a thin-and-light phone, somewhere in the region of 27 hours if you’re continuously streaming video. But it's still a phone, arguably your most used device on a daily basis, so you may need to top it up during the day if you're using it constantly. That’s where Apple’s iPhone Air MagSafe battery pack comes in, and it’s currently on sale for $79.
This accessory only works with the iPhone Air, but much like the phone it attaches to, it’s extremely slim at 7.5mmm, so crucially doesn’t add so much bulk when attached that it def...

item.title: OpenAI, Reliance partner to add AI search to JioHotstar
item.description: The rollout includes two-way integration that surfaces streaming links directly inside ChatGPT.

item.title: Co-founders behind Reface and Prisma join hands to improve on-device model inference with Mirai
item.description: Mirai raised a $10 million seed to improve how AI models run on devices like smartphones and laptops.

item.title: Super deal sur ce TV Neo QLED Mini LED de 55″ noté 8/10 quasiment à moitié prix pour une immersion totale
item.description: Le Samsung TQ55QN80F est un téléviseur milieu de gamme qui utilise la technologie Mini LED couplée à des Quantum Dots pour des couleurs vives et une image contrastée. Sorti à 1 290 euros, il est bradé à 655 euros sur Ubaldi.com.

item.title: Polestar dévoile son plan de voitures électriques jusqu’en 2028 avec quelques surprises
item.description: Acculé par des pertes financières importantes, Polestar, sous le giron du constructeur chinois Geely, va sortir l'artillerie lourde. Sous l'impulsion de son nouveau patron, Michael Lohscheller, la marque sino-suédoise dévoile une feuille de route pour le moins ambitieuse avec 4 nouvelles voitures d'ici 2028, avec pour objectif de doubler sa part de marché électrique. ...

item.title: Outdoor, fitness, bracelet… Garmin trace le chemin d’une année 2026 riche en nouveautés
item.description: Lors d'un appel aux investisseurs, le patron de Garmin a donné quelques pistes sur les modèles de montres attendues cette année, mais pas seulement.

item.title: New JPMorganChase report reveals midsize U.S. firms paid triple in tariffs last year
item.description: They’re the kind of businesses Trump had pledged to revive. Tariffs paid by midsized U.S. businesses tripled over the course of last year, new research tied to one of America’s leading banks showed on Thursday — more evidence that President Donald Trump’s push to charge higher taxes on imports is causing economic disruption.The additional taxes have meant that companies that employ a combined 48 million people in the U.S. — the kinds of businesses that Trump had promised to revive — have had to find ways to absorb the new expense, by passing it along to customers in the form of higher prices, ...

item.title: Nintendo just shadowdropped Xenoblade Chronicles X: Definitive Edition - Nintendo Switch 2 Edition
item.description: Nintendo just made the surprise announcement that a Switch 2 version of Xenoblade Chronicles X: Definitive Edition is available to buy right now.

item.title: Après le hack des impôts, les données de 53 millions de Français exposées par une faille de sécurité critique chez IDMerit
item.description: L'hécatombe continue pour nos données personnelles. Cette fois, c'est un intermédiaire crucial, IDMerit, qui a laissé ouverte une base de données d'un milliard de comptes clients. Il est très utilisé dans le secteur bancaire.

item.title: The Trump administration is building a website to help Europeans evade content bans
item.description: The US government is escalating its feud with the EU over free speech by building a dedicated portal that lets users access banned content.

item.title: The latest 45W Anker Nano charger with smart display is $10 off right now
item.description: Anker rolled out a bunch of new chargers and other gear at CES 2026, including a cute one that's already on sale. The new Nano charger with smart display, which is an upgrade to the existing Nano charger in Anker's lineup, is on sale for $30 right now for Prime members. That's $10 off the regular price. The 45W charger includes a smart display that shows real-time data like power flow, temperature and charging status. It also features "fun animations to keep things cheerful." Anker says it can recognize what's being charged and automatically adjust certain metrics to ensure a longer battery li...

item.title: Microsoft admits an Office bug exposed confidential user emails to Copilot
item.description: M365 Copilot Chat was summarizing your emails, whether you granted it access or not.

item.description: Plus, could the new 'Mario' movie include a wild Nintendo crossover?

item.title: Abxylute’s new Switch 2 controller prototype has one big problem
item.description: Gaming accessory company Abxylute has launched a Kickstarter campaign for its upcoming N6 and GameCube-style N9C Switch 2 dock-style controllers. If the ergonomics of Nintendo's Joy-Cons don't jibe with you, these aim to be solid alternatives, particularly for people with medium-to-large-size hands. Both of Abxylute's new controllers have bigger, more comfortable grips than Joy-Cons offer, […]...

item.title: These former Big Tech engineers are using AI to navigate Trump’s trade chaos
item.description: Amari AI is making custom AI-powered software that helps customs brokers modernize and minimize constantly shifting trade policies.

item.title: For open-source programs, AI coding tools are a mixed blessing
item.description: AI coding tools have enabled a flood of bad code that threatens to overwhelm many projects. Building new features is easier but maintaining them is just as hard.

item.title: The Future Games Show has announced the hosts for its Spring 2026 showcase, along with the first few games that will be featured next month
item.description: The Future Games Show Spring 2026 showcase has found its hosts in Baldur’s Gate 3's Devora Wilde and LEGO Batman: Legacy of the Dark Knight's Shai Matheson ahead of the presentation next month.

item.title: Microsoft's ROG Xbox Ally X just saw price hikes in Australia and Japan — I'm willing to bet that other regions are next
item.description: Microsoft's ROG Xbox Ally X handheld may be the latest victim hit by the ongoing RAM crisis, after price increases in Japan and Australia.

item.title: This new social network is designed specifically for neurodivergent adults
item.description: Synchrony is built to foster friendships among a unique population. Can AI help neurodivergent adults connect with each other? That’s the bet of a new social network called Synchrony, which believes AI and a well-designed social network with the right safeguards can reduce social atomization and calm the overwhelming cacophony of socializing online....
